statements: UPDATE virtual_classroom SET grade = 95 WHERE student_id = 1234;
UPDATE virtual_classroom SET student_name = 'Alice', grade = 85 WHERE student_id = 5678;
UPDATE virtual_classroom SET grade = 95 WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_name = 'Mathematics';
